imgDesc.text: The Harmonious Reed Pipe requires the ripples released by bursting <color=#ffe14b>Dew Bubbles</color> to be activated. The <color=#ffe14b>number of runes</color> displayed on top shows which <color=#ffe14b>order is required to activate</color> the same group of Harmonious Reed Pipes for the challenge. When there are multiple Pipes with the <color=#ffe14b>same number of runes</color> , then these Pipes must be <color=#ffe14b>activated at the same time</color> .
